name: EcoWorld Aquarium
openingHours: クリスマス 10 に 20 (夏時間) 以外無休 10 に 18 (冬時間)

offers.description:
Adult						        $20
Child (4-15 yrs)					$10
Preschool (3yrs and under)			Free
Student (>15 with ID)				$18
Senior (>65 with ID)				$18
Family (2 adults & up to 3 children)		$50
Single family (1 adult & up to 3 children)	$40
Guided tours “Behind the Scenes” tour	+$10 person
